sentences.sContent: Inside the aircraft a spectroscope would "read" the data and record where the bacteria around land mines is located.
sentences.sContent_eng: Inside the aircraft a spectroscope would "read" the data and record where the bacteria around land mines is located.
sentences.sCn: 飞机里面的分光镜“读出”数据，并记录下地雷周围细菌的具体位置。

sentences.sContent: The specialty pigment in the CarSecure stickers can be checked using a special hand-held spectroscope, which employs optical and acoustical signals to indicate whether the sticker is genuine.
sentences.sContent_eng: The specialty pigment in the CarSecure stickers can be checked using a special hand-held spectroscope, which employs optical and acoustical signals to indicate whether the sticker is genuine.
sentences.sCn: 有种特别的手持分光镜可以检测出车用安全贴纸中的特殊的色素，可以使用光学的，声学的信号来显示出安全贴纸的真假。

words.tran: 光谱测定的；度谱的；分光仪的；能谱仪的

trans.tranOther: an instrument used for forming and looking at spectra
